definition: following this in time or order or place, the time yet to come
details:
adverb
- following this in time or order or place
- in a future life or state
= example: in a future life or state
- in a subsequent part of this document or statement or matter etc.
= synonyms: hereunder, hereinafter
noun
- the time yet to come
= synonyms: future, futurity, time to come
- life after death
= synonyms: afterlife
